title: (Windows10) Matplotlib support failed Fatal Python error: Cannot recover from stack overflow.
body:
I use the "conda install -c conda-forge shap" to install shap package, while it doesn't work.
Matplotlib support failed
Matplotlib support failed
Matplotlib support failed
Matplotlib support failed
Matplotlib support failed
Matplotlib support failed

Matplotlib support failed
Matplotlib support failed
Fatal Python error: Cannot recover from stack overflow.
Thread 0x00004608 (most recent call first):
  File "D:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\envs\shap\lib\selectors.py", line 314 in _select
  File "D:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\envs\shap\lib\selectors.py", line 323 in select
  File "D:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\envs\shap\lib\socketserver.py", line 236 in serve_forever
  File "D:\Program Files\JetBrains\PyCharm 2018.1.4\helpers\pydev\pydevconsole.py", line 317 in start_console_server
  File "D:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\envs\shap\lib\threading.py", line 864 in run
  File "D:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\envs\shap\lib\threading.py", line 916 in _bootstrap_inner

  File "D:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\envs\shap\lib\site-packages\IPython\core\history.py", line 829 in run
  File "D:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\envs\shap\lib\site-packages\IPython\core\history.py", line 58 in needs_sqlite
  File "<decorator-gen-24>", line 2 in run
  File "D:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\envs\shap\lib\threading.py", line 916 in _bootstrap_inner
  File "D:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\envs\shap\lib\threading.py", line 884 in _bootstrap
